author: Joseph Young
title: Shocking Study Theorizes Compelling Mutated Coronavirus Origins
description: New studies suggest that while some coronavirus cases emerged from the wet market, earlier cases likely emerged from somewhere else. The post Shocking Study Theorizes Compelling Mutated Coronavirus Origins appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• A biotech firms study suggests that coronavirus may have mutated within the human body, then spread to other humans.
  • It also suggests there is not enough data to conclusively state the virus came from bats and pangolins.
